sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; /** * Categories Component * * Displays a grid of property categories with images and hover effects. * * Features: * - Responsive grid layout * - Image loading states * - Hover effects on category cards * - Accessible category links * * State: * - loadedImages: Tracks which category images have finished loading */ function Categories() { const categories = [ { id: 1, title: "Houses", count: 125, image: "/assets/images/houses.jpg" }, { id: 2, title: "Apartments", count: 243, image: "/assets/images/apartments.jpg" }, { id: 3, title: "Villas", count: 87, image: "/assets/images/villas.jpg" }, { id: 4, title: "Commercial", count: 65, image: "/assets/images/commercial.jpg" } ]; return (

Browse by Property Type

Explore our wide range of properties across different categories

{categories.map(category => (

{category.title}

{category.count} Properties

))}
); } export default Categories;
